events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
System has categorized the customer issue as a Refund request based on keywords like refund and wrong item.
Assigning support agent Julia to handle the customer's refund request for incorrect product delivery.
Hello, this is Julia from customer support. Iâ€™m here to help resolve your refund request quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process the refund?
Sure, my order number is #456789 and I attached a photo showing the item I received is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate the quick response to fix this issue.
The refund has been processed successfully. Please allow a few days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund and that everything is satisfactory on your end.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thanks again for handling this so smoothly!
Closing the case as the refund has been received and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
